law.catch_line: Employing Or Permitting Employment Of Minor Under 15 To Beg
law.text: A parent or other person who employs a minor under fifteen in begging or who, having the care or custody of such minor, permits him to engage in such employment shall be punished by a fine of not more than two hundred dollars or by imprisonment for not more than six months.
